remarks: The intersection of a line with a plane not containing it is an atom. (Contributed by NM, 29-Jun-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
llnmlpln.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
llnmlpln.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
llnmlpln.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
llnmlpln.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
llnmlpln.n $e |- N = ( LLines ` K ) $.
llnmlpln.p $e |- P = ( LPlanes ` K ) $.
llnmlplnN $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. N /\ Y e. P ) /\ ( -. X .<_ Y /\ ( X ./\ Y ) =/= .0. ) ) -> ( X ./\ Y ) e. A ) $.
